```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
```

```{r}

laender <- c("Baden-Württemberg", "Bayern", "Berlin", "Brandenburg", "Bremen", "Hamburg", "Hessen", "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern", "Niedersachsen", "Nordrhein-Westfalen", "Rheinland-Pfalz", "Saarland", "Sachsen", "Sachsen-Anhalt", "Thüringen")

get.cases <- function(land){
  read_tsv("data/Germany/{land}.tsv" %>% glue(), skip = 3) %>% mutate(land=as.character("{land}" %>% glue()))
}

get.cases("Bayern") 
```
